channel.title: Help with prodject czar

item.title: Help with prodject czar
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Well first of all, the operator ‘==’ means equal too, so you’re low level portal would be for only level 60. You’ll need to use the operator ‘<=’ meaning “less than or equal too,” so anyone would under level 60 would aloud in. Next, your second if statement is a little off…should use the greater than operator, (’>=’) so that anyone over level 95…not just level 95 will get that message. Finally, your variable ‘combatlevel’ is undefined (I’m guessing). From a quick check of Project Czar, you would use the variable ‘combat’

Read full topic

@zamorakgod22 wrote:

Ok you go to you project czar folder>right click> delete,
or you can do project czar folder>click once> click delete on keyboard
hope that helps
^.^

item.title: Help with prodject czar
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

noteim using czar if that has anything to do with this

im adding a bounty hunter type game to my server, i need a code were to go through the portal u need a certain cb lvl

here is what i have so far

case 7288: // bh portL 
if (combatlevel == 60){
teleportToX = 2524;
teleportToY = 3495;
sendMessage("welcome to the low level bounty");
}
else
{
if (combatlevel == 95)
sendMessage("your combat level is too high for low level portal");
}
break;

i get erres when i compile, someone correct it for me?

Read full topic
